# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only

# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.

# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

add_subdirectory(mounts)

add_library(essentials-core-services)


target_compile_options(essentials-core-services PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)

target_link_libraries(essentials-core-services PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  cpp-string_utils-base64
  library-cpp-yson
  essentials-ast-serialize
  yql-essentials-minikql
  yql-essentials-sql
  essentials-utils-log
  yql-essentials-core
  essentials-core-common_opt
  essentials-core-peephole_opt
  essentials-core-type_ann
  providers-common-codec
  providers-common-mkql
  providers-common-provider
  common-schema-expr
  providers-result-expr_nodes
)

target_sources(essentials-core-services PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/core/services/yql_eval_expr.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/core/services/yql_eval_params.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/core/services/yql_out_transformers.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/core/services/yql_lineage.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/core/services/yql_plan.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/core/services/yql_transform_pipeline.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/core/services/yql_eval_expr.h
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/core/services/yql_eval_params.h
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/core/services/yql_out_transformers.h
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/core/services/yql_lineage.h
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/core/services/yql_plan.h

)
